extensionDescription.message: Open a shared link of a SharePoint or OneDrive file directly with the right app, instead of the browser.

forceMsedgeOptionText.message: Force to open links in Microsoft Edge.

AlwaysLinkOptionText.message: Always show the button to open the link in a browser.

prefsInfoDesc_1.message: It's not always possibile to get the right file type from the email received by Sharepoint or OneDrive.

prefsInfoDesc_2.message: If this extension can't understand the file type, it will show four buttons: one to use Word, one to use Excel, one to use PowerPoint and one to open the file in the browser.

prefsInfoDesc_3.message: The option to force to use Microsoft Edge is for a scenario where you do not use Edge as the default browser, but is the browser used with your Business account.
